parameters.name: reads
parameters.label: Path to fastq reads
parameters.usage: These must be wrapped in single quotes. If R{1,2} is specified, UMI deduplication processes will be run.

parameters.name: genomes_base
parameters.label: Reference genome base path
parameters.usage: Bio-Rad formatted refence genomes and annotations

parameters.name: outDir
parameters.label: Output path
parameters.usage: Indicate the output directory to write to

parameters.name: skipUmi
parameters.label: Skip UMI processing
parameters.usage: Indicate that only R1 has been provided and no UMI processing is required

parameters.name: genome
parameters.label: Species
parameters.usage: Genome to align to and annotate against

parameters.name: spikeType
parameters.label: Spike in type
parameters.usage: The type of spike in used, if any

parameters.name: minMapqToCount
parameters.label: Minimum MapQ score to count
parameters.usage: The minimum MapQ socre for an aligned read to count toward a feature count

parameters.name: minBp
parameters.label: Min base pairs per read
parameters.usage: Reads with fewer base pairs will be rejected

parameters.name: validateInputs
parameters.label: Validate Input Reads
parameters.usage: Ensure input meets standards and is below 500 million reads

parameters.name: reverseStrand
parameters.label: Is the libarary reverse stranded?
parameters.usage: Indicate if your library is reverse stranded

parameters.name: noTrim
parameters.label: Skip read trimming?
parameters.usage: Indicates whether or not trimming skipped on the reads

parameters.name: fivePrimeQualCutoff
parameters.label: 5' read quality cutoff
parameters.usage: The read quality below which bases will be trimmed on the 5' end

parameters.name: threePrimeQualCutoff
parameters.label: 3' read quality cutoff
parameters.usage: The read quality below which bases will be trimmed on the 3' end

parameters.name: minGeneCutoff
parameters.label: Option to define minium threshold for what genes are reported
parameters.usage: Provide double value to cutoff how many reads are minimally required for a gene to be counted

parameters.name: minGeneType
parameters.label: Option to define minium threshold type for genes are reported
parameters.usage: Provide metric to be used for quantifying gene expression

parameters.name: seqType
parameters.label: Option to define type of sequencing used (Paired vs Single end)

parameters.name: max_cpus
parameters.label: Max CPUs
parameters.usage: The max number of cpus the pipeline may use. Defaults provided by -profile.

parameters.name: max_memory
parameters.label: Max Memory
parameters.usage: The max memory in GB that the pipeline may use. Defaults provided by -profile.
